noticeDescription:
NOTICE is given that in accordance with the City’s real estate disposal by-law, on December 10, 2020, a portion of the public lane, with stratified portions located at the rear of 2104-2110 Yonge Street, legally described as Part of Lane on Plan 585E Toronto; Being Lane Between Hillsdale Avenue West & Manor Road West, designated as Part 3 on 66R-27137, shown as Parts 3 and 8 on the attached draft reference plan, were declared surplus, conditional upon City Council approving the permanent closure of the said lane. The public lane has a total area of approximately 451 m2 ± (4,854.5 ft2 ±).  The City proposes to invite an offer to purchase part of the subject lane from the adjacent owner.

The following City official has information about the proposed disposition: Mrs. Trixy Pugh, Tel: 416-392-8160, Metro Hall, 55 John Street, 2nd floor, Toronto, Ontario M5V 3C6. Enquiries may be made of the said official until the December 31st, 2020.
signedBy: John D. Elvidge, Interim City Clerk
title: Declaration of Surplus Properties
topics: Sale of City Property/Real Estate > Proposed sale of City property
